abstract: Joseph Morrissey is sworn in as delegate in Virginia State Legislature, day after easily winning special election, even though he is serving six-month jail sentence for having sex with a minor; he is on work-release program during day.
lead_paragraph: Joseph Morrissey, ousted over charges of having sex with a minor, easily won re-election in the midst of a six-month jail term, and was sworn in over the objections of colleagues.
snippet: Joseph Morrissey, ousted over charges of having sex with a minor, easily won re-election in the midst of a six-month jail term, and was sworn in over the objections of colleagues.

headline.main: Virginia Politician Serves 2 Terms: In Jail and in the State Legislature
headline.print_headline: Virginia Politician Serves 2 Terms: In Jail and in the State Legislature
headline.sub: Joseph Morrissey Takes Seat in Virginia House of Delegates
